articles.description: Quarterbacks are often judged by championships, and Dallas is putting its faith -- and $160 million -- in its franchise leader.
articles.content:
FRISCO, Texas -- Gone are the days of Dak Prescott, fourth-round-pick success story.
Now that the quarterback has signed a multiyear deal with the Dallas Cowboys, he will be defined by the $160 mill… [+5141 chars]
